about_the_game:
A dazzling, mythical firefly that glows with every color of the rainbow. Legend has it that a Rainbow Firefly lit the first stars in the ancient days.

The Rainbow Firefly is accompanied by several orbs of colorful light that have an affinity for growing things and will lead you to harvestable herbs.

This special pet is a pre-release exclusive item that will not be made available after the game launches.
detailed_description:
A dazzling, mythical firefly that glows with every color of the rainbow. Legend has it that a Rainbow Firefly lit the first stars in the ancient days.

This special pet is a pre-release exclusive item that will not be made available after the game launches.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12.0 Monterey
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
